title: Crying within
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Mental illness
abstract: A young girl's struggle with schizophrenia and her wish for a better life
description: A short created by a student for the 2004 ACMI Diegesis secondary school media festival. A narrative of a schizophrenic girl's struggle to come to terms with her unstable mind and her wish to have a better life. She speaks of a faceless person, her other self, who goads her into self-mutilation and as a result suffers a recurring nightmare. A disturbing tale of the struggles of coming to terms with dealing with inner voices.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Compilation title; B1006675; Diegesis Festival 2004. Program 2; Active; 2004
